info.name: LOR tango-compact
info.description: Compact version of tango theme with small (80x80) avatars at right + some general fixes. Version 1.5.4
info.additionalInfo:
* compact single-line navigation menu
* compact message style
* right-side small avatars
* style for LORcode tools
* works with FF and Chrome
* rainbow in tracker page :)
* compact "touch" buttons

2012.02.15 - 1.5.2 navigation menu fix
2012.02.16 - 1.5.3 another navigation menu fix
